text.p: Suppose [mathjaxinline]T: V\rightarrow W[/mathjaxinline] is a linear transformation, and let [mathjaxinline]w\in W[/mathjaxinline]. Is the question of whether [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] is in the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] an existence question or a uniqueness question?

font.p: This is equivalent to asking whether there exists [mathjaxinline]v\in V[/mathjaxinline] such that [mathjaxinline]T(v)=w[/mathjaxinline].
